Headline: Co-Founder & CEO @Jaagruk Bharat | Building Bharat‚Äôs Trusted Helpdesk | IITKGP
Comment:
Absolutely agree Sir ‚Äî solving for Bharat means building with Bharat at the core. At Jaagruk Bharat, we‚Äôre doing exactly that:

1. A WhatsApp-first platform built in vernacular languages (English, Hindi, Bengali, Marathi next)
2. Designed for Tier 2/3 and rural citizens who need help navigating govt or non-govt schemes and processes
3. Combining tech + human support to help people apply for these services without confusion
Our agents walk the last mile. Our bot speaks their language.

Bharat doesn't need global playbooks. It needs context-first builders.
And we're proud to be one of them.
